entry.title: No edocument created in ecockpit (SAP Public Cloud)
entry.content:
Dear Everyone,

No eDocuments available in edocumetn cockpit, in SAP Public cloud.

I have posted the billing docuemnt XXXX for company Belgium company and Customer has Belgium VAT number in identification and all the neccary configuration has been created inthe system, but still no edocument genreated. Do any face this problem?

SAP Document and Reporting Compliance SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 

Regards

Janarthanan

entry.title: Why cant I create a PO from my PR is "Process purchase requisitions"? (BD3)
entry.content:
The errors that I get are: 

Currency and Net price are filled.
It does work however using the old app Create purchase orders - advanced.

Does anyone have a solution?

entry.title: Error message 5XU DRC Germany
entry.content:
Hi dear community,

after setting up the Scope Item 5XU for E-Invoice Germany, I get the following message during testing: Proxy error SOAP:1007 SRT: Unsupported xstream found: (â€œHTTP C: ode 401 : Unauthorizedâ€) Execution failed; see further messages for details. Error triggers message; details can be found in the interface log.

The configuration has been compared with other systems where it works perfectly, but it still doesn't work. In addition, the configuration is very similar to the blog post here:  Electronic Invoicing in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition

Can anyone help me with how to deal with this error message?

BR

Matze

 

 

Log:

entry.title: Add restriction when logging to SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Are there ways in restricting access to SAP Public Cloud using VPN or through IP Address?

Client would like to make sure that their users can access SAP Public Cloud using their company network.

entry.title: Restrict Consumption of raw material from specific store in co11n
entry.content:
I have a query, a system restriction is required to prevent material consumption from the specific storage location â€œStoreâ€ during production confirmations in transaction CO11N. At present, users can consume stock from all storage locations, including â€œStore,â€ which leads to incorrect inventory postings and stock discrepancies.

is there any solution through which system block or restrict this specific storage location so that users are not able to issue or consume materials from â€œStoreâ€ during CO11N confirmations.

entry.title: Automatic Task creation for production posting changes documents in SAP Public Cloud WM
entry.content:
Hi,

Is it possible to schedule a warehouse task creation job for for production posting changes documents? I have tested /SCWM/R_DLV_PDO_CREATE_WT_JT but it seem to pick only outbound deliveries (PDO)? Not posting changes for production supply.

entry.title: Is Intercompany Asset Transfer Across Different Countries Supported in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud ?
entry.content:
When we try to execute the transfer using the standard app, we receive the error:

FAA_POST303 â€“ â€œTransfer not possible as company code XXXX and YYYY are in different countries/regions.â€

I checked the available documentation and could not find any explicit SAP Note or official statement confirming whether cross-country intercompany asset transfers are supported or not in Public Cloud.

entry.title: The Detail of Service Contract cannot Display
entry.content:
Hi Dears
I want to check the detail of date rules (ZCONT007). We have written the logic in it. 
When I pressed the details button, the popup message appeared below.
Then I pressed continue button, the detail of date rules cannot display. 
Is there anyone know the reason?

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 
#Service Contract 
@Wei

entry.title: Hide company code by default
entry.content:
Hi all,
we need a company code in our SAP public cloud system, which should be by default not be seen by anyone. Only to some users, for which we would create additonal roles where needed. Alternative option would be to create additional roles and restrict one to not see the company code, and allow the other role to see it. But that sounds like many roles to be duplicated across the system. Any idea how to handle that?

Many thanks
Tobias

entry.content:
What are the prerequisite checks that has to be completed before creating service request for Parallel LIne.

entry.title: Copy Text from Sevrice Order to Billing Document
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts,

I am working with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Service 
 
I would like to transfer a text object from the Service Order to the corresponding billing document (e.g. billing information for the customer). Which text type is not relevant, currently NO texts are copied/transferred (from my understanding)

Important: the text I want to maintain is only known AFTER creating a service confirmation.

Do you have an idea how to realize this (without custom fields?)

BR
Simon

entry.title: Repair order planned costs double upon release status
entry.content:
Why the repair order planned costs double upon releasing the repair order item.

Thank you.

entry.title: Add New Condition Types and Account Keys in Existing Tax Procedure in SAP S4HANA Public Cloud.
entry.content:
Dear SAP,

We have raise a ticket with the reference of  ticket number - 1415730.

 

 Subject: Unable to Add New Condition Types and Account Keys in Existing Tax Procedure

Required: we want to add the New condition types and Account keys in Tax procedure

Issue: We need to add new condition types and account keys to our existing tax procedure. However, the system is not allowing us to create new entries. The procedure appears in edit mode, but the New Entries option is disabled and the fields remain locked.

Request:
Please assist in enabling the New Entries option for adding condition types and account keys in the tax procedure, or provide the necessary corrections so that we can update the configuration.

Please find the attached file for your reference.

 

Regards.

Asma shaik

entry.title: SAP_BR_PROJECT_MANAGER_PROF be in "Business Role Template"
entry.content:
Hi All

I activated scope item Internal Project Management â€“ Project-Based Services (1A8) and Customer Project Management â€“ Project-Based Services (J11).
I tried to find SAP_BR_PROJECT_MANAGER_PROF in "Business Role Template" to assign a business role, but I couldn't find it.
If I activate the scope item above, shouldn't SAP_BR_PROJECT_MANAGER_PROF be in "Business Role Template"?

Thank you

entry.title: How many industries, countries/regions, and languages â€‹â€‹does SAP S/4HANA Cloud support?
entry.content:
Hi Expert

How many industries, countries/regions, and languages â€‹â€‹does SAP S/4HANA Cloud support?
Is it correct that the Private Edition supports 25 industries, 64 countries/regions, and 39 languages?
How many of each does the Public Edition support?

BR
Takashi

entry.title: How to consume s4 hana public cloud SOAP Outbound Service in CPI for replication
entry.content:
Hii Community,

Can someone help me out how to configure my Sender(S4 Public Cloud) and Consumer(CPI) system to replicate production order data from S4 to MES System through CPI?

I got replication SOAP service from api.sap.com which needs to be activated in SAP. Let me know if someone has done this kind of integration.

I appreciate your attention on question

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: Automating the Import of ISO 20022 Customer Payment Status Report Files In S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD: Is T
entry.content:
Hi everyone,
I am looking to automate the process of importing ISO 20022 Customer Payment Status Report files into our SAP S4Hana CLOUD system. I was wondering if there is a specific API or an integrated solution that SAP offers to efficiently handle these files.

Does anyone have experience with this type of automation? Any suggestions on how to configure or implement such a solution?

Thank you in advance for your support!

entry.title: Reversing Debit/Credit Signs for Statistical Accounts in SD Billing
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

Iâ€™m dealing with an SD customer invoice where the system also creates several statistical postings to accounts starting with â€œ9*â€ (for example 9xxxxxxxx). These accounts are purely informational and donâ€™t affect financial balances.

The issue is that the FI document currently shows these statistical 9* accounts on the credit side, and the offsetting statistical accounts (transport/logistics type accounts) on the debit side.

The customer finds this layout confusing and is asking for the signs to be reversed so it looks more intuitive when they view the journal entry.

So the goal is:

  • 9* statistical account â†’ Debit

  • Offset statistical accounts â†’ Credit

This concerns only the statistical lines of the SD invoice, not the real accounting lines.

Iâ€™m trying to understand:
ğŸ‘‰ Where in SAP is the sign of these statistical postings controlled?

Is this usually done through:

  • Pricing procedure settings / account key

  • VKOA account determination

  • A pricing routine (VOFM)

  • Or a user-exit/BAdI like ACC_DOCUMENT that manipulates the FI document?

If anyone has experience changing the sign for statistical condition postings in SD billing, Iâ€™d appreciate guidance on where to look.

Thanks!

entry.title: Letter of Credit payment
entry.content:
Dear SAP

May I know if SAP can provide a standard process of letter of credit payment? The funds can beed paid to bank but not yet paid to the customer, how should the kind of business initiate financial approval on the business side before posting?

Thanks and regards

Justine
